description:
For those times that the perfect spot for your solar panel, isn’t the perfect spot for you and your BaseCharge. This cable lets you place your solar panel up to 4.8m away from your BaseCharge.

  • High Power Pole (HPP) male port on one end and 1 HHP female port on the other
  • Gauge: 12AWG
  • Length: 4.8m (15’)
name: BioLite Solar Power Extension Cable
